subject: Pedal Faces
description_text:
If I make a purchase, Would you be able to swap the Accelerator Pedal face for the Brake Pedal Face?

I prefer a short pedal face over the longer one that's installed on the Accelerator Pedal.

conversations.body_text: Hi Jake Went, The short panel cannot be installed on our current pedal design. However, we are considering making improvements in future versions to allow the throttle pedal to support the short panel as well.

That's a shame, Can you give me an eta on when the throttle pedal can be replaced?
________________________________
Hi，Jake Went，     ​  The current throttle bracket has a straight design, and when switching to a short panel, only one screw can be secured, which limits installation options and stability.      ​

That is a shame, Going to have to skip these pedals than.

Thanks anyway.
________________________________
Hi Jake Went,  I’m currently working on producing a batch of throttle pedals with a curved design, which is expected to take around 10 days. Would you be willing to wait for this updated version?

It depends on the price and what they look like.

Do you have any pictures?

I was planning on purchasing the Simsonn Plus X Pedals
________________________________
Hi Jake Went,    We have communicated and agreed to temporarily not address the issue with the short throttle panel. Thank you for your understanding!

Wait what?

So the new pedals where a lie?
________________________________
Hi Jake Went,     Due to low demand, we do not manufacture short-throw throttle pedals.  Thank you for your understanding and support!

I'm not understanding, You literally emailed me saying you have new pedals coming out in 10 days?

What is going on?
________________________________

Hi Jake Went,    That was just an initial plan. However, after further discussion with the R&D team and considering the development might take longer than expected, we decided to put the panel project on hold for now.
